data.text: @ariannahuff @pfizer @AlbertBourla @LinkedIn Dear Ashton, we appreciate your support for Ukraine! The war is here and Nuclear disaster may be much bigger than in Chernobyl. Help us close the sky! Before the world gets another nuclear catastrophe and millions of people die! Please call your authorities to action! https://t.co/j9EVO6IDbl
@ariannahuff @pfizer @AlbertBourla @LinkedIn You seem to be 100% propaganda these days.
